How the 2010 Winter Olympics changed Vancouver and Whistler
Comment: So far, I see no problem in Vancouver having this incredible Olympic experience in 2030. You can even expand that legacy elsewhere in the city, you never know. It is the people of Canada, Vancouver, Whistler and Richmond who are sure of all of this.

Video Caption: How the 2010 Winter Olympics changed Vancouver and Whistler
Comment: The emotional impact and community building of having the Olympic games in Vancouver can’t be overstated.

Video Caption: How the 2010 Winter Olympics changed Vancouver and Whistler
Comment:
The 600 million dollar highway improvements that save 4-5 lives a year is the biggest accomplishment. Take it from someone that drives the 99 on the regular; it’s FAR superior in its current state to the one that preceded it. 

There is a reason why every car commercial in Canadian history has been filmed on the S2S highway. That’s over reaching, but you get the point.
